message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this amazing product for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. How about we meet in the middle at $85? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've done some research and I'm pretty sure that's a fair price for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you've done your research, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm not willing to go up to $80 just yet. How about we try $87? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $87. I'm willing to meet you at $82. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'd be happy to make a purchase at that price.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $84? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
